sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useContext } from "react"; import { useLocation, useParams, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import AnimeFinder from "../apis/AnimeFinder"; import { AnimeContext } from "../context/AnimeContext"; const AddAnime = () => { const { addAnime } = useContext(AnimeContext); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [location, setLocation] = useState(""); const [priceRange, setPriceRange] = useState("Price Range"); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await AnimeFinder.post("/", { name, location, price_range: priceRange, }); console.log(response.data.data); addAnime(response.data.data.restaurant); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } }; return (
/*
Add Anime Component
setName(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="name" />
setLocation(e.target.value)} className="form-control" type="text" placeholder="location" />
setName(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="name" />
setLocation(e.target.value)} className="form-control" type="text" placeholder="location" />
*/ ); }; export default AddAnime;
